comments:
Created an attachment (id=83955)
screenshot of error message

Build ID: M20071023-1652

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Create Table in Data Source Explorer
2. Right-click Table->Data->Edit
3. Enter data into first column
4. When clicking onto second column to enter data, I get an:
Unhandled event loop exception
StackOverflowError

and eclipse tells me that I should close the application


More information:
I followed the tutorial at:

https://www6.software.ibm.com/developerworks/education/os-eclipse-europa1/section3.html

here is a part of the .log file:
